title: How to Dab Towards the Left Side
safety: Ensure you are in an open space to avoid hitting objects or people
Do not attempt if you have any shoulder or arm injuries
core_principles: The dab is a simple dance move that involves dropping your head to one side while raising the opposite arm
It's important to maintain balance and control throughout the movement

steps.name: Starting Position
steps.how: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, arms relaxed at your sides
steps.why: This position provides a stable base for the movement
steps.cues: Keep your knees slightly bent for better balance
common_mistakes: Standing too stiffly, which can lead to loss of balance

steps.name: Raise Your Right Arm
steps.how: Slowly raise your right arm to shoulder height, keeping it straight
steps.why: This sets up the opposite arm movement required for the dab
steps.cues: Imagine you're pointing to something directly in front of you
common_mistakes: Raising the arm too high or too low

steps.name: Drop Your Head to the Left
steps.how: Simultaneously drop your head to the left side, aligning your face with your left armpit
steps.why: This is the signature movement of the dab
steps.cues: Keep your eyes focused downward to maintain the position
common_mistakes: Dropping the head too far forward or backward

steps.name: Hold the Position
steps.how: Hold the dab position for 1-2 seconds, maintaining balance and control
steps.why: This allows you to fully execute the move and prepare for the next step
common_mistakes: Holding the position for too long, which can lead to discomfort

steps.name: Return to Starting Position
steps.how: Slowly raise your head and lower your right arm back to your side
steps.why: This completes the dab movement and prepares you for repetition or the next dance move
steps.cues: Move smoothly to maintain the flow of the dance
common_mistakes: Returning to the starting position too quickly or abruptly

evaluation: Able to perform the dab towards the left side with proper form and balance
Can hold the position steadily for 1-2 seconds
